title: Kindred E bugged?
body:
* Kindred's E puts a mark on the enemy that will deal a base amount +AD +5%maxHP when hit with 3 autos
* It has a damage cap of 300 to monsters
* I believe that there is an error in the coding that causes this number (300) to be applied as base damage to champions on the ability
___
At level 1 I did 317 damage to an Ezreal by popping this mark
I honestly hope this IS a bug and not intended
